column5: I actually love ice fishin' Mike, i just like to travel to do it... ice fish for a week and then back home to thaw out!
Well To start is -8 in Simcoe County this Morning and light snow. Tomorrow night the big day begins at -13.    dsn
-30 here this morning.
I'll take the -30 any day.
Think with the long wait for hardwater more folks will put themselves in danger because they are more eager to get out there before its safe!!  dsn
And..........the upcoming week    -14 is a slight chill in the air, I might have to put on a sweater soon

I don't check the weather network for the weather they have let me down many moons. I go to Accu Weather they make me smile. Take a look at the long range night temps from sunday night. Long Range For Simcoe County

Looks like the temps are finally dropping. Sunday supposed to be -14 at night and Monday also. Tuesday -13, but Wednesday is the coldest at -22. It just drop a degree from -21 to -22. But the cold temps seem to be staying from here on in.    Check it out!!  Accu Weather 1-15 day outlook for Simcoe County    dsn  Bring on the Ice!!
Thank god finaly.
Thank you lord!!!  There is a GOD!!!
ahh perfect!! finally...
yep time to check and double check the winter wear and  electronic toys.   dsn
I am ready to pack the car!!!
Was watching the news aswell. It said that were supsoe to get 10-15 cm of the white stuff and areas aroudn the golden horseshoe can recieve double or triple the amounts.
white stuff    whats that
Wed. morning in Timmins, minus 34!
Yeahhhhh, ICE... COMON ICE...  Lets hope the COLD weather last....

Winnipeg reported -48 with the windchill this morning.  They'd probably luv some of that Global Warming right about now.  3 people died across the Prairies this week too when their vehicles broke down and they tried walking to safety......terrible !!
glad I will be able to use the new ice fishing stuff, I was starting to wonder if i would ever have a chance to use the stuff... Gonna be colder in Burlington starting sunday too...

Hope we get a extreme deep freeze -35 or so to make up for lost time!! Hate to miss out on JP  this year since the water is deep there gonna need least 2-3 feet of Ice.  Usually I don't get out til late Feb  dsn
a week of those temps I'll be zipping around the bog on the sled nevermind fishing
Im amazed that so many people are happy about it being minus 30.  You'll find me in the spring.
Minus 12 and falling up here near Nipissing. Its about bloody time!! Yeeeehaaaa!!!
8 0c HERE RIGHT NOW IN PORT DOVER AND ONLY SOPPOST TO FALL TO -2 TONIGHT.
I guess you will be wetting the lines again naughty.Can't wait for the next report.Mike
I will be out again in the morning Mike.  What can i say i'm a fishoholic......Do they have help groups for that?.......lol
lets hope the cold lasts for a few days without snow to get 5 or so inches of real good clear ice.i hope evrybody stays safe and doesnt jump the gun.....
That was loud, Nautifish.  But it's still ok because I keep the speakers down low.
woo hooo ... ok .. then one last run at the eastern tribs for me .. gonna go tomorrow  ... then next week .... its a new set of gear
It's about time, all the gear is ready, just have to find that dang charger for the Vex.
Y'all just keep that freezin' cold crap up there to your selves!!! I hate having to wear clothes!!!
Hey Glen when the Ice is ready we will invite you to try ice fishing.
